module.name: work_structure
module.keywords: module, systems engineering, project management, work

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the pieces of work necessary to complete a project.
This module is constructed from several ISO/TS Application modules. The Work_structure_arm contains the information necessary to defined the work to be performed.

The Work_structure_arm provides for the identification and characterization of a and a . It provides for an association to be made between the work request and the which initiated the work request. It contains an identification of the activities governed by a work order. It defines the hierarchy of tasks to be performed along with required inputs, and deliverable products and information. It contains the definition and quantification of planned as well as completed .

inscope.li: identification and characterization a work request and work order;
association of a work request with an activity method;
identification of the product or activity data affected by the work request;
identification of the activities that are governed by a work order;
the definition and quantification of planned as well as recorded work outputs;
the relationships between the work output and detailed descriptions of the output.

outscope.li: association of work structure with activity or product data;
identification and characterization of work associated schedule;
identification and characterization of work associated person and organization;
identification and characterization of work associated project breakdown;
identification and characterization of work associated project management information resources;
the relationships between organization structure, project breakdown, project management information resources and schedule.
